content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Nesibe, thank you for considering my apartment. I believe that the market rate for a 25 square meter apartment in New York is quite competitive. However, I am willing to negotiate with you to find a mutually beneficial agreement. May I ask what your budget is for the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 1200 Euros per month. I am open to any negotiation, but I don't want to exceed my budget.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for sharing your budget, Nesibe. Based on current market rates, I would be willing to consider a rental price of 1200 Euros per month. However, I would like to clarify that this price includes all utilities and other expenses associated with the apartment. Would you be open to discussing this further?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 1200 Euros per month, including utilities and other expenses associated with the apartment. I am ready to sign the lease agreement.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Excellent! I am glad that we were able to reach an agreement that works for both of us. I will prepare the lease agreement for you to review and sign. Once you have signed, you will be able to move into the apartment and start enjoying your new home. Thank you for choosing my apartment, Nesibe.
name: Heinrich Heine
